text: wadha tllaqtm nisa'akum dun althalath waintahat eidatuhuna min ghyr murajaeat lahuna, fala tudiquu -'ayaha al'awlia'a- ealaa almutalaqat bimaneihina min aleawdat 'iilaa 'azwajahuna bieaqd jadid 'iidha 'aradn dhalika, wahadath altaradi shreana werfana. dhlk yueaz bih man kan minkum sadiq al'iiman biallah walyawm alakhira. 'iin tark aleadl watamkin al'azwaj min nikah zawjatihim 'akthar nima'an wataharatan li'aeradikim, wa'aezam manfaeatan wthwabana lakum. wallah yaelam ma fih silahukum wa'antum la taelamun dhilkan
